alert.note: Alert for Atchison (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 9:33AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Atchison County through 1030 AM CDT... At 932 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sidney to near Julian to near Tecumseh. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Rock Port, Fairfax, Blanchard, Westboro, Watson, Indian Cave State Park and Phelps City. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 101 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
